body:
> If the current behavior is a bug, please provide the steps to reproduce.

Please do it, otherwise we can't help, I think something wrong in non official webpack plugin, no problems in our tests
Interesting profile. Do you have the cpuprofile for the first one?

I have no plugins enabled, and just css loader and asset module.  There are just a ton of files and modules in this project.

> Interesting profile. Do you have the cpuprofile for the first one?

I could get one real quick. brb.

[issue 13825 - v1.zip](https://github.com/webpack/webpack/files/6843140/issue.13825.-.v1.zip)

Here's a similar run with the same characteristics. @sokra
Thanks that was very useful. I'll see tomorrow if that can be fixed.

issue.title: fix a type problem which lead to performance problems

repository.name: webpack-sources
repository.description: Source code handling classes for webpack

issue.title: update webpack-sources for performance problem in hashing

repository.name: webpack
repository.description: A bundler for javascript and friends. Packs many modules into a few bundled assets. Code Splitting allows for loading parts of the application on demand. Through "loaders", modules can be CommonJs, AMD, ES6 modules, CSS, Images, JSON, Coffeescript, LESS, ... and your custom stuff.

issue.body:
add `stats.reasonsSpace` and `stats.groupReasonsByOrigin` to control large set of reasons
`detailed` preset limits all spaces to 1000 by default

fixes #13825

body: And, just confirmed it is totally fixed, wow, thank you @sokra!
